---
format: html

include-in-header:
  - text: |
      <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/typed.js@2.0.12"></script>
---

# Welcome to my website!

<p>I'm <span class="typed"></span></p>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var options = {
      strings: ["a Data Scientist", "a Data Analyst", "a Power BI Expert", "a Python Instructor", "a Freelancer", "an IT Automation Expert"],
      typeSpeed: 70,
      backSpeed: 30,
      loop: true
    };

    var typed = new Typed(".typed", options);
  });
</script>
